name: Create Table Query
func:
msg.topic = `
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS plant_data (
    plant_name TEXT,
    type TEXT,
    soil_moisture INTEGER,
    light INTEGER,
    temperature INTEGER,
    humidity INTEGER,
    image_file TEXT,
    manual_moisture INTEGER,
    manual_light INTEGER,
    sync_grow_light INTEGER,
    s_flag INTEGER
);`;
return msg;

name: Drop Table Query
func:
msg.topic = "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS plant_data;";
return msg;

name: DELETE from plant_data
func:
msg.topic = "DELETE FROM plant_data;";
return msg;
